t:
He stood at the edge of the roof, sweating.
The bullies shouted, “What are you gonna do now?”

                         ***

He lied on the ground, bleeding.
The bullies whispered, “What are we gonna do now?”
c:
The police told the dead boy's parents, powerless, “You should let this go now.”



#bully #rooftop #fear #fall #bleeding #helpless #regret #force
